Views¶

Views to handle all requests for account app.

accounts.views.login(request)[source]¶

View to login a valid registered user only.

Type: GET/POST

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

accounts.views.logout(request)[source]¶

View to logout a user.

Type: GET

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

accounts.views.registration(request)[source]¶

View to handle registration. If called with GET opens registrations form otherwise on POST register a user with given details.

Type: GET/POST

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

accounts.views.registration_closed(request)[source]¶

This view is called when user tries to register in case registration is closed via settings.REGISTRATION_OPEN.

Type: GET

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

accounts.views.registration_resend_otp(request)[source]¶

View to send OTP during verification process. No limitation on number of request is set for now. Call to this view is only valid for registered user who’s status is verification_pending.

Type: POST

Authors: Gagandeep Singh

accounts.views.registration_verify(request)[source]¶

A View to verify user registration by entering OTP send to mobile no.

This view can be called in case:
  • Normal registration flow: After user has signed up with his details, he is redirected to this view to verify himself.
  • Direct call withing expiry: In case user was unable to finish verification, he can directly use url before this link expires according to accounts.models.RegisteredUser.``last_reg_date``.

Type: GET/POST

Authors: Gagandeep Singh
